subSections.title: Readings
Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{ja-pron|y=k|まる|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}
* Pitch accent for prefix unknown.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|まる}}

# ''any [[round]] [[object]]'':
## a [[circle]]
## a [[sphere]], [[ball]]
## {{lb|ja|by extension}} ''any non-perfectly round objects, such as'' an [[oval]]
## the "{{m|ja|○}}" [[symbol]], equivalent to a [[check mark]] in some other languages
## {{lb|ja|by extension}} something [[correct]], [[good]], or [[right]]
# {{lb|ja|colloquial|sort=まる}} [[money]]
#: {{synonyms|ja|金銭|tr=kinsen}}
# [[enclosure]] [[inside]] a [[castle]]'s [[wall]]s
# {{lb|ja|colloquial|sort=まる}} the {{ja-l|。}} mark, or {{m|ja|句点|tr=kuten||[[full stop]], [[period]]}}
# {{lb|ja|colloquial|sort=まる}} the {{ja-l|゜}} mark, or {{m|ja|半濁点|tr=handakuten||semi-voicing mark}}
# the [[circular]] [[outline]] of a Japanese [[crest]]
# {{lb|ja|Kansai|sort=まる}} a [[soft-shell turtle]]
#: {{synonyms|ja|鼈|tr=suppon}}
# ''term relating to [[completeness]]'':
## [[full]]ness, [[whole]]ness
## [[meeting]] [[specific]] [[conditions]]
# ''a Japanese unit of weight''
#: 1 ''maru'' is equal to 50 {{m|ja|斤|tr=kin}}, approximately 30 [[kilogram]]s
# ''a Japanese unit of counting ''[[washi]]'' ''
# a [[day]] where [[price]]s are [[double]]d in a [[red-light district]]
